subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Options for the Jets include keeping quarterback Mark Sanchez, who had 24 turnovers this season, as a backup in 2013 or trading him to a team that would take on his salary.
snippet: Options for the Jets include keeping quarterback Mark Sanchez, who had 24 turnovers this season, as a backup in 2013 or trading him to a team that would take on his salary.
